job.title: Senior Software Engineer (Python)
job.description:
We are looking for a Senior Software Engineer (Python) that will be responsible for assisting the software development team with developing and designing web applications, performing cross-browser and cross-platform testing, writing good quality, scalable, and testable code, analyze and maintain existing software application, and discover and fix programming bugs.

This position works closely with the software development and leadership team to contribute to a robust, innovative software solution. You will work on innovative and exciting projects that make a lasting impact on Mobile reCell and our clients.

Responsibilities

Write effective, scable code using Python programming language

Coordinate with development team to determine application requirements

Assist with back-end development by coding, debugging and testing software applications

Develop modules in Python for automation and solving business problems

Coordinate with front-end developers to integrate user-facing elements into applications

Assist software development team to implement code fixes under the direction of senior developers

Assist development team in infrastructure maintenance and security enhancements

Apply best practices for scalability

Create and test effective API endpoints

Develop automated test scripts utilizing our existing testing framework

Write complex SQL scripts, stored procedures

Assist in the selection and implementation of tools and technologies used in development, project planning/tracking, and testing

Understand business problems and architect solutions

Manage multiple projects in a fast-paced, deadline-driven environment

Perform other software development tasks as needed

Experience with Git Flow methodology

Experience with microservices oriented architecture

Qualifications

BS or MS in Computer Science, Engineering preferred but not required

6+ Years of relevant work experience

Minimum of 2 Years experience with building APIs and services using REST or similar

Minimum of 2 Years experience with modern programming languages like Python or Java

Experience in following coding and documentation standards and adhering to best practices

Experience in deploying python applications in Linux environments

Experience with containerized applications

Experience with data serialization

Knowledge of Algorithms/data structures, Object Oriented Design Principles, Networking (TCP, UDP data transfer methods)

Knowledgeable and experience in security protocols

Strong problem solving, analytical, and critical thinking skills

Demonstrated ability to perform effectively and positively in a fast-paced, team-oriented environment

Knowledge and ability to implement smart modern web standards including accessibility and usability

Ability to work independently with minimal supervision

Experience with DataTables/SQL Reporting/SSRS/Power BI is a great plus

Experience in data analytics and machine learning is a great plus

Job Type: Full-time

Pay: $110,000.00 - $125,000.00 per year

Benefits

Dental insurance

Disability insurance

Employee discount

Flexible schedule

Health insurance

Life insurance

Paid time off

Professional development assistance

Vision insurance

Schedule

Monday to Friday

Application Question(s)

Will you now, or in the future, require sponsorship for employment visa status (e.g. H-1B visa status)?

Are you willing to undergo a background check, in accordance with local law/regulations?

Experience

Python: 6 years (Preferred)

Work Location:

One location

Work Remotely

Temporarily due to COVID-19
